sql.statement: create table if not exists director (_id integer primary key autoincrement, director_name text not null, director_hire_cost integer, director_reputation integer)
create table if not exists actor (_id integer primary key autoincrement, actor_name text not null, actor_hire_cost integer, actor_reputation integer, gender text)

create table if not exists movie (_id integer primary key autoincrement, movie_name text, tagline text, description text, genre_id integer, earnings integer, cost integer, producer_id text, director_id integer, distributor_id integer, composer_id integer, sfx_id integer, sound_id integer )
create table if not exists genre (_id integer primary key autoincrement, genre_name text)
create table if not exists actor_bonus (actor_id integer, genre_id integer)
create table if not exists director_bonus (director_id integer, genre_id integer)
create table if not exists production_company (_id text primary key, name text, reputation integer, budget integer, last_modified text)
create table if not exists cast (movie_id integer, actor_id integer)
create table if not exists distributor (_id integer primary key autoincrement, distributor_desc text, distributor_name text)
create table if not exists sfx (_id integer primary key autoincrement, sfx_name text not null, sfx_hire_cost integer, sfx_reputation integer, sfx_credits text)
